---
layout: post
tag: blog
title: May 2017 darkroom progress update
date: 2017-05-04
published: true
permalink: /posts/darkroom-progress-update-may-2017.html
excerpt: Even closer to finishing our darkroom
heroimage: devereenlarger
---

**We were optimistic of an April launch, it's now May! But we're nearly there.... Honestly!**

We got ourselves into a position of only needing to add the plumbing and the electrics, close off the small bit of ceiling, touch up the painting, and we would be done. However, we hit a snag, and a fairly significant one...

The enlargers were too tall for the ceiling! DOH!

So, the past weekend has been spent replanning the enlargers' location and subsequently raising a section of the ceiling, and dropping one side of workbenches – as can be seen below.


The change has been for the good anyway, the enlargers' work levels may have been a tad too high previously, and we've gained more free workbench space in the process.

Light leak spotting!
